SMART METER V3 SMART METER Enter Phone Number Enter the OTP OTP AUTHENTICATION SUBMIT SEND RESEND
OTP AUTHENTICATION LIVE TRACKING MODAL NOTIFICATION It is guarded with Fire-Base Verification, and Google sign-in is also available This notification interrupts user, So that the user does not miss the track We will help you to decrease your expenses in electricity using live tracking SKIP NEXT Lets Get Started
Continue With Phone Number Smart Meters Provide New Ways to Track Energy Consumption Data Google Facebook By continuing, you agree that you have read and accept our T&C and Privacy Policy
Enter Phone number for Verification This number will be used for verifying your number with electricity board. You shall receive SMS with code for verification. +91 We sent you a code to verify your mobile number Enter your OTP code here I "didn't" receive any code Resend Code Verify Now
LPIN FORGOT LPIN
SIGN UP ENTER FULL NAME NEW LPIN CONFIRM LPIN
SET ELECTRICITY USAGE NOTIFICATION Limit
Connect Phone with \nSmart Meter Connect to the NodeMCU named hotspot network by turning on the WIFI You\'ll be directed to a website where you\'ll need to input your account\'s registered phone number and lpin in order to connect to the smart meter and obtain power usage information. CONNECT
SIGN IN
RESET PASSWORD
//DASHBOARD SCREEN STRINGS DASHBOARD 0 0% LIMIT 0% / KWH : UNIT PRICE INR NOTE: Currently the cost of electricity consumption is increased by 10INR/UNIT
//FAQ SCREEN STRINGS What kind of questions are asked in the quiz? How do i create an account? I am a registered user, How do i Edit/Manage MY ACCOUNT? How can i see my scores of each mode, that i have got
In this quiz app there are three types of mode: one is find the name of the flag, and questions in depth about the varieties of country flags Under the drawer menu there is an option to create an account and also the user will be asked to create account on the app start or if the user does not exists You can Edit/Modify you account details under the profile section in the drawer menu. You modify the it and click the update button to change the details You can see your scores under the section score stat with the progress of your scores
//ABOUT US SCREEN STRINGS CONTACT DETAILS 8838014189 teamnumber13@gmail.com XYZ
//PROFILE SCREEN STRING UPDATE CHANGE THE DETAILS OF YOUR PROFILE IF YOU WISH
